meta.title: Aharai! Boost - The Summer of a Lifetime
meta.description: Join the Founding Cohort of Aharai! Boost: A unique 6-week journey in Israel that blends epic travel with deep leadership training.

descriptionLines: The ultimate summer experience for those who want more than just a vacation.
A journey of resilience, identity, and unforgettable bonds.

programTimeline.heading: The Journey: From Tourist to Leader
programTimeline.subheading: 6 weeks designed to challenge, connect, and build you.

weeks.title: The Foundation
weeks.description: Strangers become family. Building the 'tribe' through trust, team challenges, and creating a home base.

weeks.title: The Land
weeks.description: Forget the bus window. We explore Israel's raw beauty and human mosaic through our feet, meeting the people who make this country beat.

weeks.title: The Spirit
weeks.description: An immersive IDF experience. Understanding the values, the ethics, and the responsibility of defending a home. No filters.

weeks.title: The Grit
weeks.description: Resilience Week. Survival skills, field navigation, and physical challenges designed to prove: You are stronger than you think.

weeks.title: The Voice
weeks.description: Leadership & Advocacy. Master the art of storytelling. Learn to lead conversations and represent your truth with confidence.

weeks.title: The Launchpad
weeks.description: Processing the journey and packing the mental tools you'll need for campus life and beyond.
